project.name: Beliar
project.goal: Beliar was developed during a computer graphics course and is therefore more a graphical prototyp than an actual game.
project.summary: A prototypical RPG game inspired by the Dungeon Keeper series
project.functionality: Allthough it is a grapical prototyp, Beliar contains all basic principles and functionality of a classic RPG game including the creation of buildings, the farming of resources and the order of units.
project.process:
Sketching

Besides the user interface the game mechanics such as the units, the resources and the buildings needed to be sketched.

Implementation

  • JAVA
  • Blender
  • Ableton
  • Photoshop
